GSD.product_version: versions from v3.10 to before v5.10.134
GSD.description:
perf/core: Fix data race between perf_event_set_output() and perf_mmap_close()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.134 by commit 43128b3eee337824158f34da6648163d2f2fb937, it was introduced in version v3.10 by commit 9bb5d40cd93c9dd4be74834b1dcb1ba03629716b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: perf/core: Fix data race between perf_event_set_output() and perf_mmap_close()
